entry.title: Matryoshka Embeddings with Aditya Kusupati, Zach Nussbaum, and Zain Hasan - Weaviate Podcast

link.title: Matryoshka Embeddings with Aditya Kusupati, Zach Nussbaum, and Zain Hasan - Weaviate Podcast

entry.content: A podcast where we discuss Nomic Embed Matryoshka Embeddings alongside Aditya Kusupati, one of the main authors of Matryoshka Representation Learning
entry.summary: A talk on Matryoshka Embeddings and practical applications with Nomic Embed

entry.title: How Nomic AI Is Driving The Open Source Revolution - MAD Podcast with Matt Turck

link.title: How Nomic AI Is Driving The Open Source Revolution - MAD Podcast with Matt Turck

entry.content: Matt Turck was kind enough to have us on to chat about Nomic as a company and our newly released SOTA Nomic Text Embedding model.
entry.summary: Zach Nussbaum and Brandon Duderstadt chat about Nomic Embed Text with Matt Turck
